channel.title: CVE Feed for F-Secure -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for F-Secure -- all products

item.description: A Denial-of-Service (DoS) vulnerability was discovered in F-Secure Atlant whereby the AVRDL unpacking module component used in certain F-Secure products can crash while scanning a fuzzed files. The exploit can be triggered remotely by an attacker. A successful attack will result in Denial-of-Service (DoS) of the Anti-Virus engine.

item.title: CVE-2021-40834|2024-08-04T02:51:07.506Z -- f-secure -- f-secure%20mobile%20security
item.description: A user interface overlay vulnerability was discovered in F-secure SAFE Browser for Android. When user click on a specially crafted seemingly legitimate URL SAFE browser goes into full screen and hides the user interface. A remote attacker can leverage this to perform spoofing attack.

item.title: CVE-2021-40835|2024-08-04T02:51:07.421Z -- f-secure -- f-secure%20mobile%20security
item.description: An URL Address bar spoofing vulnerability was discovered in Safe Browser for iOS. When user clicks on a specially crafted a malicious URL, if user does not carefully pay attention to url, user may be tricked to think content may be coming from a valid domain, while it comes from another. This is performed by using a very long username part of the url so that user cannot see the domain name. A remote attacker can leverage this to perform url address bar spoofing attack. The fix is, browser no longer shows the user name part in address bar.

item.title: CVE-2021-40833|2024-08-04T02:51:07.454Z -- f-secure -- f-secure%20endpoint%20protection%20products%20on%20windows%20and%20mac.%20f-secure%20linux%20security%20%2832-bit%29%20%20f-secure%20linux%20security%2064%20f-secure%20internet%20gatekeeper%20%26%20f-secure%20atlant
item.description: A vulnerability affecting F-Secure antivirus engine was discovered whereby unpacking UPX file can lead to denial-of-service. The vulnerability can be exploited remotely by an attacker. A successful attack will result in denial-of-service of the antivirus engine.

A vulnerability affecting F-Secure antivirus engine before Capricorn update 2022-02-01_01 was discovered whereby decompression of ACE file causes the scanner service to stop. The vulnerability can be exploited remotely by an attacker. A successful attack will result in denial-of-service of the antivirus engine.

item.title: CVE-2021-40836|2024-08-04T02:51:07.487Z -- f-secure -- f-secure%20endpoint%20protection%20products%20on%20windows%20and%20mac.%20f-secure%20linux%20security%20%2832-bit%29%20%20f-secure%20linux%20security%2064%20%20f-secure%20atlant%20%26%20f-secure%20internet%20gatekeeper
item.description: A vulnerability affecting F-Secure antivirus engine was discovered whereby scanning MS outlook .pst files can lead to denial-of-service. The vulnerability can be exploited remotely by an attacker. A successful attack will result in denial-of-service of the antivirus engine.
